#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b) {
    if(b == 0) {
        return a;
    }
    return gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main() {
    int t, n, m;
    cin >> t;
    while(t --) {
        cin >> n >> m;
        if(n == 1 || m == 1 || n == m) {
            cout << max(n, m) << endl;
        } else {
            int a = n, b = m;
            if(m > n) {
                a = m; b = n;
            }
            int r = gcd(a - 1, b - 1);
            a = (n - 1) / r;
            b = (m - 1) / r;
            int count = 0;
            for(int i = 1, j = 1; i <= n && j <= m; i = i + a, j = j + b) {
                count ++;
            }
            cout << count << endl;
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
